layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584 [color=#FFFFFF]
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 400x30
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 400x30
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 400x26
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 396x26 [color=#800080] [bgcolor=#008000] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutTable {TABLE} at (1,1) size 351x24 [color=#FFFFFF]
                LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 351x24
                  LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 351x20
                    LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 347x20 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
                      LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 345x18
                        text run at (1,1) width 345: "This text should be white, since we're in quirks mode."
